Metadata.Title: The Delgado Cartel
Metadata.Description: 47.  The Delgado Cartel has been implicated in a series of high stakes hostage killings.  Our client has specifically asked for you , 47.   Your handling of the Chilean mansion incident did not go unnoticed.  The remaining heirs to the Cartel are your targets.  Permanently cripple this organization by removing Hector, Martinez and their forger, known only as The Vanisher.  Good luck 47.  Oh and your customized shotgun is ready. No Country for Bold Men? I haven't seen that yet. Do be careful 47.
